title: Share your ONE HOUR + games

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: Title. Share link to match history. Wins or loses. Feel free to point things out that interested you looking at the match. For example...my damage to champions that game, I think that is a new highest record for me. However, I keep forgetting to upgrade my trinket when I hit full build. >.<

replies.body: Why would I sell it? And what for? The cdr is nice and 3/5 of them with life steal so there was every reason to keep it. Ez was pretty much a delete-or-die case but for Panth and Xin, bursting them to 40% actually meant something.
